Soul World:
local Data = {}

for _, Module in pairs(script:GetChildren()) do
	if Module:IsA("ModuleScript") and not Data[Module.Name] then
		Data[tonumber(Module.Name)] = require(Module)
	end
end

return Data

NormalRewards:
--return {
--	["default"] = { Rerolls = 3 },
--	[010] = { Rerolls = 20 },
--	[020] = { Rerolls = 20 },
--	[030] = { Rerolls = 20 },
--	[040] = { Rerolls = 20 },
--	[050] = { Rerolls = 100, ["Baruka's Dagger"] = 1 },
--	[060] = { Rerolls = 20 },
--	[070] = { Rerolls = 20 },
--	[075] = { Rerolls = 100, ["Demon Monarch's Necklace"] = 1 },
--	[080] = { Rerolls = 20 },
--	[090] = { Rerolls = 20 },
--	[100] = { Rerolls = 100, ["Elixir Of Life"] = 1 },
--}

local BossFloorItems = {
	[50] = "Baruka's Dagger",
	[75] = "Demon Monarch's Necklace",
	[0] = "Elixir Of Life",
}

return setmetatable({}, {
	__index = function(_, Floor: number)
		local Remainder = Floor % 100
		local BossFloorItem = Floor > 0 and BossFloorItems[Remainder]

		if BossFloorItem then
			return { [BossFloorItem] = 1, Rerolls = 100 }
		end

		if Floor % 10 == 0 then
			return { Rerolls = 20 }
		end

		return { Rerolls = 3 }
	end
})

--return {

--	[020] = Rewards(10, 20),
--	[030] = Rewards(10, 20),
--	[040] = Rewards(10, 20),
--	[050] = Rewards(20, 40), -- * Special
--	[060] = Rewards(10, 20),
--	[070] = Rewards(10, 20),
--	[075] = Rewards(20, 40), -- * Special
--	[080] = Rewards(10, 20),
--	[090] = Rewards(10, 20),
--	[100] = Rewards(20, 40), -- * Special
--}

local BossFloorItems = {
	[50] = true,
	[75] = true,
	[0] = true,
}

return setmetatable({}, {
	__index = function(_, Floor: number)
		local Remainder = Floor % 100
		local BossFloorItem = Floor > 0 and BossFloorItems[Remainder]

		if BossFloorItem then
			return { ["Cupcake"] = 20, ["Cursed Finger"] = 40 }
		end

		if Floor % 10 == 0 then
			return { ["Cupcake"] = 10, ["Cursed Finger"] = 20 }
		end

		return { ["Cupcake"] = 5, ["Cursed Finger"] = 10 }
	end
})
